00002 /*! _dgbmatrix+dssmatrix operator */
00003 inline _dgematrix operator+(const _dgbmatrix& matA, const dssmatrix& matB)
00004 {
00005 #ifdef  CPPL_VERBOSE
00006   std::cerr << "# [MARK] operator+(const _dgbmatrix&, const dssmatrix&)"
00007             << std::endl;
00008 #endif//CPPL_VERBOSE
00009   
00010 #ifdef  CPPL_DEBUG
00011   if(matA.N!=matB.N || matA.M!=matB.M){
00012     std::cerr << "[ERROR] operator+(const _dgbmatrix&, const dssmatrix&)"
00013               << std::endl
00014               << "These two matrises can not make a summation." << std::endl
00015               << "Your input was (" << matA.M << "x" << matA.N << ") + ("
00016               << matB.M << "x" << matB.N << ")." << std::endl;
00017     exit(1);
00018   }
00019 #endif//CPPL_DEBUG
00020   
00021   dgematrix newmat(matB);
00022   
00023   for(long i=0; i<matA.M; i++){
00024     for(long j=max(0,i-matA.KL); j<min(matA.N,i+matA.KU+1); j++){
00025       newmat(i,j)+=matA(i,j);
00026     }
00027   }
00028   
00029   matA.destroy();
00030   return _(newmat);
00031 }

00034 /*! _dgbmatrix-dssmatrix operator */
00035 inline _dgematrix operator-(const _dgbmatrix& matA, const dssmatrix& matB)
00036 {
00037 #ifdef  CPPL_VERBOSE
00038   std::cerr << "# [MARK] operator-(const _dgbmatrix&, const dssmatrix&)"
00039             << std::endl;
00040 #endif//CPPL_VERBOSE
00041   
00042 #ifdef  CPPL_DEBUG
00043   if(matA.N!=matB.N || matA.M!=matB.M){
00044     std::cerr << "[ERROR] operator+(const _dgbmatrix&, const dssmatrix&)"
00045               << std::endl
00046               << "These two matrises can not make a summation." << std::endl
00047               << "Your input was (" << matA.M << "x" << matA.N << ") + ("
00048               << matB.M << "x" << matB.N << ")." << std::endl;
00049     exit(1);
00050   }
00051 #endif//CPPL_DEBUG
00052   
00053   dgematrix newmat(-matB);
00054   
00055   for(long i=0; i<matA.M; i++){
00056     for(long j=max(0,i-matA.KL); j<min(matA.N,i+matA.KU+1); j++){
00057       newmat(i,j)-=matA(i,j);
00058     }
00059   }
00060   
00061   matA.destroy();
00062   return _(newmat);
00063 }

00066 /*! _dgbmatrix*dssmatrix operator */
00067 inline _dgematrix operator*(const _dgbmatrix& matA, const dssmatrix& matB)
00068 {
00069 #ifdef  CPPL_VERBOSE
00070   std::cerr << "# [MARK] operator*(const _dgbmatrix&, const dssmatrix&)"
00071             << std::endl;
00072 #endif//CPPL_VERBOSE
00073   
00074 #ifdef  CPPL_DEBUG
00075   if(matA.N!=matB.M){
00076     std::cerr << "[ERROR] operator*(const _dgbmatrix&, const dssmatrix&)"
00077               << std::endl
00078               << "These two matrises can not make a product." << std::endl
00079               << "Your input was (" << matA.M << "x" << matA.N << ") * ("
00080               << matB.M << "x" << matB.N << ")." << std::endl;
00081     exit(1);
00082   }
00083 #endif//CPPL_DEBUG
00084   
00085   dgematrix newmat( matA.M, matB.N );
00086   newmat.zero();
00087   
00088   for(long c=0; c<matB.VOL; c++){
00089     for(long i=max(0,matB.Indx[c]-(matA.KU+1));
00090         i<min(matA.M,matB.Indx[c]+matA.KL); i++){
00091       newmat(i,matB.Jndx[c]) += matA(i,matB.Indx[c])*matB.Array[c];
00092     }
00093   }
00094   
00095   matA.destroy();
00096   return _(newmat);
00097 }
